browser.name: browser
browser.mimeTypes: x-scheme-handler/http x-scheme-handler/https text/html application/x-extension-htm application/x-extension-html application/x-extension-shtml application/xhtml+xml application/x-extension-xhtml application/x-extension-xht

border radius.description: The border radius of bar elements and window borders in pixels

border width.description: The border width of bar elements and window borders in pixels

screen gap.description: The gap between the border of the screen and the bar and windows

show laptop battery.name: showLaptopBattery
show laptop battery.description: Automatically hidden if not on laptop. Also includes a menu with options for screen brightness and power profiles

show power menu.name: showPowerMenu
show power menu.description: If the computer is NOT a laptop and this is true, the battery indicator gets switched out with a power menu where you can switch power profile and screen brightness (if your system supports that).

mpris bar enabled.name: mprisBarEnabled
mpris bar enabled.description: Whether the mpris media player should be enabled or not

date time format.name: dateTimeFormat
date time format.description: Look up the Qt Date Time documentation for help

tray icon size.name: trayIconSize
tray icon size.description: Maximum of 18 (if you want them to actually fit in the container lol)

show battery charge outline.name: showBatteryChargeBg
show battery charge outline.description: Shows a background around the battery indicator that's filled in according to the charge percentage

enable power profile control.name: enablePowerProfileControl
enable power profile control.description: Enables a menu on the battery module, that allows you to change the power profile of your pc. You need to have the power-profiles-daemon installed and running for it to work. Gets disabled automatically if the daemon doesn't exist.

enable brightness control.name: enableBrightnessControl
enable brightness control.description: Adds a slider for brightnessctl to the power menu. Also enables the menu if power profile control isn't enabled. Gets disabled automatically if brightnessctl isn't found.

backlight device name.name: backlightDeviceName
backlight device name.description: The device you would like the brightness slider to affect. This varies from device to device, but the most common seems to be 'intel_backlight'.

album art menu size.name: albumArtMenuSize
album art menu size.description: The size of the album art in the media player menu

show album art.name: showAlbumArt
show album art.description: Whether to show album art in the bar or not

show position.name: showPosition
show position.description: Whether to show a background around the media player that gets filled up according to the song progress

maximum width.name: maximumWidth
maximum width.description: The maximum width of the media player's text in integers. The clipped text gets elided with three . (dots) If empty or zero, the media player will have a maximum width equals to one third of the full bar

show shuffle button.name: showShuffleButton
show shuffle button.description: Does not work with most media players, so is disabled by default

show repeat button.name: showRepeatButton
show repeat button.description: Does not work with most media players, so is disabled by default

show volume slider.name: showVolumeSlider
show volume slider.description: Does not work with most media players, so is disabled by default
